intro: Polyadenia macrophylla, commonly known as the large-leaf polyadenia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens, though it can be invasive in some regions.
